Name: Maya Margarita
Ingredients: 10 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pink river salt rim & lime wedge.
Review: A tasty Margarita with Grand Marnier, Agave Sec liqueur and orange juice.
History: Created in 2010 by Rob Jameson at Maya Bar, Shanghai, China.
Nutrition: One serving of Maya Margarita contains 136 calories
